10bc4c2c5525:
# Passage

धर्म्म कर्म्म

dharma karma

Dharma (righteous duty) and Karma (action)
5b819ac8b373:
# Passage

आत्मानात्म विवेक

ātmānātma viveka

Discrimination between Self (ātman) and non-Self (anātman)
3cc7a2a4cebb:
# Passage

जीवात्मा परमात्मा ज्ञान

jīvātmā paramātmā jñāna

Knowledge of the individual soul (jīvātmā) and the Supreme Self (paramātmā)
9afc7ba58c85:
# Passage

परम निःश्रेयस्

parama niḥśreyasa

The Supreme Good, the highest felicity
456deb063a38:
# Passage

चित्त प्रशान्ति

citta praśānti

Tranquility of mind, peace of consciousness
32426d8b226c:
# Passage

मिथ्या दृष्टि

mithyā dṛṣṭi

False perception, erroneous vision
7271ab042d93:
# Passage

ऋषयो वा इन्द्रं प्रत्यक्षं नापश्यन् । तं वशिष्ठः प्रत्यक्षमपश्यत् ।
    सोऽब्रवीत् ब्रह्माणं ते वक्ष्यामि । यथात्वत् पुरोहिताः प्रजाः प्रजनिष्यन्ते ।

ṛṣayo vā indraṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāpaśyan | taṃ vaśiṣṭhaḥ pratyakṣamapaśyat |
so'bravīt brahmāṇaṃ te vakṣyāmi | yathātvat purohitāḥ prajāḥ prajaniṣyante |

The sages did not perceive Indra directly. Vasiṣṭha perceived him directly. He said, "I will tell you of Brahman. In accordance with truth, your priests will beget offspring."
361f866962da:
# Passage

दक्षिणकपर्दोवशिष्ठाः आत्रेयास्त्रिकपद्दिनः ।
      आङ्गिरसः पञ्चचूडाः मुण्डाभृगवः शिखिनोऽन्ये ॥

dakṣiṇakapardovaśiṣṭhāḥ ātreyāstrikapaddīnaḥ |
āṅgirasaḥ pañcacūḍāḥ muṇḍābhṛgavaḥ śikhino'nye ||

The Vasiṣṭhas with right-side hair-knots, the Ātrēyas with three tufts, the Āṅgirasas with five crests, the Bhṛgus with shaven heads, and others with top-knots.
053c2cdc4248:
# Passage

वसिष्ठोक्तविधिः कृ त्स्नो द्रष्टव्यात्र निरामिषः ।

vasiṣṭhoktavidhiḥ kṛtsno draṣṭavyātra nirāmiṣaḥ |

The complete method taught by Vasiṣṭha is to be understood here as free from desire for worldly rewards.
0f7daca52f7c:
# Passage

वशिष्ठ चेकितायनः

vaśiṣṭha cekitāyanaḥ

Vasiṣṭha Cekitāyana (descendant of Cekitā)
